summary:
Logistics specialists in Amsterdam, US citizen with Dutch residence permit and German job seeker visa with goal of obtaining opportunities in Amsterdam and Europe.

Highly motivated and result-oriented experienced logistics specialists seeking operations, supply chain, and project opportunities internationally. I have firsthand knowledge leading and managing various supply chain operations and cost down initiatives while at Bosch and gained additional international expertise from acquiring my MSc in International Supply Chain Management, and a Global MBA from Royal Holloway University in London and Berlin School of Business and Innovation respectively. I am seeking to further my career in Logistics, International Supply Chain Management, or other interesting fields where my knowledge can be utilised to add value to an organisation, while providing me opportunities to grow. I possess strong communication, organisational, and analytical skills and an appreciation and enjoyment of experiencing new cultures and environments.
